SettingsConfiguration.Setting:
<!-- This file stores common "misspellings" of OCR-software and replaces them with something useful
Like: "9INSATZ" makes no sense but we know that it means "EINSATZ" so we add an entry (see below).
--> <Dictionary> <Entry Old="straBe" New="straße" /> <Entry Old="StraBe" New="Straße" />
<Entry Old="9INSATZ" New="EINSATZ" /> <Entry Old="An~bach" New="Ansbach" /> <Entry Old="Einsatznummer 1" New="Einsatznummer :" /> <Entry Old="NITTEILER" New="MITTEILER" /> <Entry Old="GmbH8cCo. KG" New="GmbH & Co. KG" /> <Entry Old="Plannummer 1" New="Plannummer :" /> <Entry Old="Station 1" New="Station :" /> <Entry Old="Haus-Nr. 1" New="Haus-Nr.:" /> <Entry Old="Objekt 1" New="Objekt:" /> <Entry Old="Schlagw. 1" New="Schlagw.:" /> <Entry Old="Stichwort B1" New="Stichwort B:" /> <Entry Old="Stichwort R1" New="Stichwort R:" /> <Entry Old="Stichwort S1" New="Stichwort S:" /> <Entry Old="Stichwort T1" New="Stichwort T:" /> <Entry Old="Stichwort Tc" New="Stichwort T:" /> <Entry Old="Prio. :" New="Prio.:" /> <Entry Old="( 1satzmittel" New="Einsatzmittel" /> <Entry Old="IJbernahme" New="Übernahme" /> <Entry Old="Spedi iton" New="Spedition" /> <Entry Old="Rufnummer 1" New="Rufnummer:" /> <Entry Old=" — " New="-" /> <Entry Old="—" New="-" /> <Entry Old="cinsatzmittel" New="Einsatzmittel" /> <Entry Old="EINSATZNITTEL" New="EINSATZMITTEL" /> <Entry Old="Tragkraftspri.tze" New="Tragkraftspritze" /> <Entry Old="41 /1" New="41/1" /> <Entry Old="4-0/2" New="40/2" /> </Dictionary>
